forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the evening, then variable clouds overnight with more showers possible. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening, then variable cloudiness overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 52F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
